name: (Not Chain) DALL¬∑E Image Generator
description: Generates new images based on text prompts, edits existing images, or creates variations of an image.(Not Chain) (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.name: code

model.name: model
model.info: The model to use for image generation.

n.name: n
n.info: The number of images to generate. Must be between 1 and 10. For dall-e-3, only n=1 is supported.

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.info: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters for dall-e-2 and 4000 characters for dall-e-3.

quality.name: quality
quality.info: The quality of the image that will be generated. This parameter is only supported for dall-e-3.

response_format.name: response_format
response_format.info: The format in which the generated images are returned.

size.name: size
size.info: The size of the generated images. Varies based on the selected model.

style.name: style
style.info: The style of the generated images. This parameter is only supported for dall-e-3.

node.description: Generates new images based on text prompts, edits existing images, or creates variations of an image.(Not Chain)

data.description: Generates new images based on text prompts, edits existing images, or creates variations of an image.(Not Chain)
